product_name: REI Timber Mountain 3-in-1 Ski Mittens - Kids'
long_description: Young snow riders who wear the waterproof and breathable REI Timber Mountain 3-in-1 mittens will keep their hands dry and warm while skiing or boarding through the trees or throwing snowballs. Mittens adapt to a wide range of conditions: kids can wear the shell mittens alone, liner gloves alone or shells and liners together. Sturdy nylon shells with waterproof and breathable inserts help ensure reliable protection on the slopes. Thinsulate(TM) polyester lining in the shells and removable stretch fleece liner gloves deliver non-bulky warmth and comfort even when damp. Gauntlet wrists easily adjust with 1 hand to help hold in heat and block cold air. Zippered pockets; reflective trim; wrist leashes.
